pages.text: You can replicate any spell you know and discovered with Incantation.
To do so, say: 'Mana, replicate magic_missile'
If it's not from EBWiz, you need mod id before spell id: 'Mana, replicate wizardry_tales:locating'
You can also combine spells, replicating not one but multiple spells: `Mana, replicate magic_missile, replicate ignite`
